verses.verse: Then <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> to <S%H4427>make<s%> him <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> [of it] (for he was in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he had <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>), that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>summoned<s%> him. When <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Your father <S%H1>made<s%> our <S%H7185>yoke<s%> <S%H5923>hard;<s%> <S%H7185>now<s%> therefore <S%H6258>lighten<s%> the <S%H7043>hard<s%> <S%H7186>service<s%> of your father and his <S%H5656>heavy<s%> <S%H1>yoke<s%> <S%H3515>which<s%> he <S%H5923>put<s%> on us, and we will <S%H834>serve<s%> you."
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to me <S%H5750>again<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>" So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1980>departed.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3289>consulted<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H5975>served<s%> <S%H6440><s%> his father <S%H1>Solomon<s%> while he was still <S%H8010>alive,<s%> <S%H2416>saying,<s%> <S%H559>"How<s%> do you <S%H349>counsel<s%> [me] to <S%H3289>answer<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H1697>this<s%> <S%H2088>people<s%>?"

And they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you will be <S%H2896>kind<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H7521>please<s%> them and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to them, then they will be your <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3605>forever.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>"

But he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H3289>given<s%> him, and <S%H3289>consulted<s%> with the <S%H3206>young<s%> <S%H3206>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> up with him and <S%H5975>served<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.

So he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H3289>counsel<s%> do you <S%H3289>give<s%> that we may <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7043>'Lighten<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your father <S%H1>put<s%> on us'?"

And the <S%H3206>young<s%> <S%H3206>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> up with him <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Your father <S%H1>made<s%> our <S%H3513>yoke<s%> <S%H5923>heavy,<s%> but you <S%H3513>make<s%> it <S%H7043>lighter<s%> for us.' <S%H7043>Thus<s%> you shall <S%H3541>say<s%> to them, 'My <S%H559>little<s%> <S%H6995>finger<s%> is <S%H6995>thicker<s%> <S%H5666>than<s%> my father's <S%H4480>loins!<s%>

<S%H6258>'Whereas<s%> my father <S%H1>loaded<s%> you with a <S%H6006>heavy<s%> <S%H3515>yoke,<s%> I will <S%H5923>add<s%> to your <S%H3254>yoke;<s%> my father <S%H5923>disciplined<s%> you with <S%H1>whips,<s%> but I [will discipline you] with <S%H3256>scorpions.<s%>' "

So <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H1696>directed,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>"Return<s%> to me on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>"
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them <S%H7186>harshly,<s%> and <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them according to the <S%H6098>advice<s%> of the <S%H3206>young<s%> <S%H3206>men,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "My father <S%H1>made<s%> your <S%H3513>yoke<s%> <S%H5923>heavy,<s%> but I will <S%H3513>add<s%> to it; my father <S%H3254>disciplined<s%> you with <S%H1>whips,<s%> but I [will discipline you] with <S%H3256>scorpions.<s%>"

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> for it was a <S%H5252>turn<s%> [of events] from <S%H430>God<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> might <S%H6965>establish<s%> His <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat.<s%>

And when <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [saw] that the <S%H4428>king<s%> did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> do we have in <S%H1732>David<s%>? [We have] <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse.<s%> <S%H376>Every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to your <S%H168>tents,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H7200>look<s%> after your own <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>" So <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> to their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
But as for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them.

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him to <S%H4191>death.<s%> And <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H553>made<s%> <S%H553>haste<s%> to <S%H5927>mount<s%> his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H6586>been<s%> in <S%H6586>rebellion<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
